item.title: End CA-62 West at I-10
item.description: End CA-62 west at I-10. Use I-10 west for Los Angeles; use I-10 east for Indio.

item.title: End CA-62 Approaching I-10
item.description: Approaching the west end of CA-62 at I-10. Use right lanes for I-10 east for Indio and Palm Springs.

item.description: Approaching I-10 on CA-62 west.

item.title: End CA-247 South at CA-62
item.description: End CA-247 south at CA-62. Use CA-62 east for 29 Palms; use CA-62 east for I-10 and Morongo Valley.
